title: River Raisin National Battlefield Park: Field Trips
body: Field Trips      We are pleased to present a Field Trip Planner (pdf 8,352) to help you with your visit to River Raisin National Battlefield Park. Teachers check if your school is eligible for FREE transportation! For any schools visit the Civil War Preservation Trust site to find out how to get help defraying the cost of transportation by using their field trip fund.     Results  There are no results to show.
